verses.verse: God, <S%H430><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> your justice; <S%H4941><s%> your righteousness <S%H6666><s%> to the royal <S%H4428><s%> son. <S%H1121><s%>
He will judge <S%H1777><s%> your people <S%H5971><s%> with righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> and your poor <S%H6041><s%> with justice. <S%H4941><s%>
The mountains <S%H2022><s%> shall bring <S%H5375><s%> prosperity <S%H7965><s%> to the people. <S%H5971><s%> The hills <S%H1389><s%> bring the fruit of righteousness. <S%H6666><s%>

He will judge <S%H8199><s%> the poor <S%H6041><s%> of the people. <S%H5971><s%> He will save <S%H3467><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of the needy, <S%H34><s%> and will break the oppressor <S%H6231><s%> in pieces. <S%H1792><s%>
They shall fear <S%H3372><s%> you while <S%H5973><s%> the sun <S%H8121><s%> endures; <S%H6440><s%> and as long as the moon, <S%H3394><s%> throughout all <S%H1755><s%> generations. <S%H1755><s%>
He will come down <S%H3381><s%> like rain <S%H4306><s%> on the mown <S%H1488><s%> grass, <S%H7241><s%> as showers that water <S%H2222><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>
In his days, <S%H3117><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall flourish, <S%H6524><s%> and abundance <S%H7230><s%> of peace, <S%H7965><s%> until the moon is no more. <S%H3394><s%>
He shall have dominion <S%H7287><s%> also from sea <S%H3220><s%> to sea, <S%H3220><s%> from the River <S%H5104><s%> to the ends <S%H657><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>
Those who dwell in the wilderness <S%H6728><s%> shall bow <S%H3766><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him. <S%H341><s%> His enemies shall lick <S%H3897><s%> the dust. <S%H6083><s%>

The kings <S%H4428><s%> of Tarshish <S%H8659><s%> and of the islands <S%H339><s%> will bring <S%H7725><s%> tribute. <S%H4503><s%> The kings <S%H4428><s%> of Sheba <S%H7614><s%> and Seba <S%H5434><s%> shall offer <S%H7126><s%> gifts. <S%H814><s%>
Yes, <S%H4428><s%> all kings shall fall down <S%H7812><s%> before him. <S%H1471><s%> All nations shall serve him. <S%H5647><s%>
For he will deliver <S%H5337><s%> the needy <S%H34><s%> when he cries; <S%H7768><s%> the poor, <S%H6041><s%> who has no helper. <S%H5826><s%>
He will have pity <S%H2347><s%> on the poor <S%H1800><s%> and needy. <S%H1800><s%> He will save <S%H3467><s%> the souls <S%H5315><s%> of the needy. <S%H34><s%>
He will redeem <S%H1350><s%> their soul <S%H5315><s%> from oppression <S%H8496><s%> and violence. <S%H2555><s%> Their blood <S%H1818><s%> will be precious <S%H3365><s%> in his sight. <S%H5869><s%>

They shall live, <S%H2421><s%> and to him shall be given <S%H5414><s%> of the gold <S%H2091><s%> of Sheba. <S%H7614><s%> Men shall pray <S%H6419><s%> for him continually. <S%H8548><s%> They shall bless <S%H1288><s%> him all day long. <S%H3117><s%>

Abundance <S%H6451><s%> of grain <S%H1250><s%> shall be throughout the land. <S%H776><s%> <S%H7218><s%> Its <S%H2022><s%> fruit <S%H6529><s%> sways <S%H7493><s%> like Lebanon. <S%H3844><s%> Let it <S%H5892><s%> flourish, <S%H6692><s%> thriving like the grass <S%H6212><s%> of the field. <S%H776><s%>

His name <S%H8034><s%> endures forever. <S%H5769><s%> His name <S%H8034><s%> continues <S%H5125><s%> as long as <S%H6440><s%> the sun. <S%H8121><s%> Men shall be blessed <S%H1288><s%> by him. <S%H1471><s%> All nations will call him blessed. <S%H833><s%>
Praise <S%H1288><s%> be to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> who alone does <S%H6213><s%> marvelous deeds. <S%H6381><s%>

Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be his glorious <S%H3519><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> forever! <S%H5769><s%> Let the whole earth <S%H776><s%> be filled <S%H4390><s%> with his glory! <S%H3519><s%> Amen <S%H543><s%> and amen. <S%H543><s%>
This ends <S%H3615><s%> the prayers <S%H8605><s%> by David, <S%H1732><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jesse. <S%H3448><s%>
